package org.mule.transport.legstar.test.lsfileal;
import org.mule.transport.legstar.transformers.AbstractJavaToHostMuleTransformer;
import com.legstar.test.coxb.lsfileal.ReplyData;
import com.legstar.test.coxb.lsfileal.bind.ReplyDataTransformers;

/**
 * ReplyData to Host Byte Array Mule Transformer.
 * <p/>
 * <code>ReplyDataToHostMuleTransformer</code> takes a ReplyData object as input
 * and turns it into a byte array in host format (EBCDIC), ready
 * to be sent to a target Mainframe.
 * <p/> 
 * Class generated by LegStar Mule Component generator.
 */
public class ReplyDataToHostMuleTransformer extends AbstractJavaToHostMuleTransformer {

    /**
     * Constructs the transformer. Source is a ReplyData object and result
     * will be a byte array.
     */
    public ReplyDataToHostMuleTransformer() {
        super(new ReplyDataTransformers());
        registerSourceType(ReplyData.class);
    }


}
